uk.ac.man.cs.mig.util.graph.ui

Interface ThumbnailViewSource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GraphComponent

    public interface ThumbnailViewSource
    User: matthewhorridge
    The Univeristy Of Manchester
    Medical Informatics Group
    Date: Jan 12, 2004

    matthew.horridge@cs.man.ac.uk
    www.cs.man.ac.uk/~horridgm

    A ThumbnailViewSource draws a minature version of a larger view when only a portion of the larger view can be seen. The portion of the larger view being viewed is indicated on the ThumbnailView. Views that wish to be represented by a thumbnail should implement this interface.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addThumbnailViewSourceListener(ThumbnailViewSourceListener lsnr)
      Adds a ThumbnailViewSourceListener to the ThumbnailViewSource so that the ThumbnailView is informed of events that it might be interested in.
      void drawThumbnail(Graphics2D g2)
      The main view should draw itself on to the graphics context provided, to produce a representation of the main view in the thumbnail view.
      Dimension getViewBounds()
      Should return the bounds of the main view.
      Rectangle getViewVisibleRect()
      Should return a Rectangle that represents the portion of the main view that is visible.
      void removeThumbnailViewSourceListener(ThumbnailViewSourceListener lsnr)
      Removeds a previously added listener.
      void scrollView(int deltaX, int deltaY)
      Allows the thumbnail view to request that the main view be scrolled by a given amount.

    • Method Detail

      • drawThumbnail

        void drawThumbnail(Graphics2D g2)
        The main view should draw itself on to the graphics context provided, to produce a representation of the main view in the thumbnail view. Note that no scaling should be applied to the graphics context.
        Parameters:
        g2 -

      • getViewBounds

        Dimension getViewBounds()
        Should return the bounds of the main view.
        Returns:
        A Dimension that specified the bounds of the main view that the thumbnail represents.

      • getViewVisibleRect

        Rectangle getViewVisibleRect()
        Should return a Rectangle that represents the portion of the main view that is visible.
        Returns:
        The visible Rectangle.

      • scrollView

        void scrollView(int deltaX,
                int deltaY)
        Allows the thumbnail view to request that the main view be scrolled by a given amount.
        Parameters:
        deltaX - The horizontal amount.
        deltaY - The vertical amount.

      • addThumbnailViewSourceListener

        void addThumbnailViewSourceListener(ThumbnailViewSourceListener lsnr)
        Adds a ThumbnailViewSourceListener to the ThumbnailViewSource so that the ThumbnailView is informed of events that it might be interested in.
        Parameters:
        lsnr - The listener to be added.

      • removeThumbnailViewSourceListener

        void removeThumbnailViewSourceListener(ThumbnailViewSourceListener lsnr)
        Removeds a previously added listener.
        Parameters:
        lsnr - The listener to removed.
